sentences.sContent: He pushed his half-eaten salad aside and left.
sentences.sCn: 他推开吃了一半的色拉走了。

sentences.sContent: He stepped aside to let Katherine go in first.
sentences.sCn: 他站到一边让凯瑟琳先进去。

sentences.sContent: Mark drew me aside and explained the problem.
sentences.sCn: 马克把我拉到一边给我解释这个问题。

sentences.sContent: She swept her thick hair aside.
sentences.sCn: 她把浓密的头发梳到一边。

synos.tran: 旁白；私语，悄悄话；离题的话

remMethod.val: a(在…) + side(旁边) → 在旁边

trans.tranCn: 在旁边， 到一边， 向一边
trans.tranOther: moved to one side or away from you
